title: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell.
description: When trying to export data from a table that is embedded inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
EB: The data from the tables should be exported without any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:  
1. Open the application.  
2. Navigate to the grid that contains a table inside one of its cells.  
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.  
4. Observe the exception being thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
